name: VoidAuth
description: VoidAuth is an open-source SSO authentication and user management provider that stands guard in front of your self-hosted applications. It is easy-to-use for admins and end-users, supports nice-to-have features like passkeys, user invitation, self-registration, email support, and more! Features include OpenID Connect (OIDC) Provider, Proxy ForwardAuth, User and Groups Management, User Self-Registration and Invitations, Customizable branding, Multi-factor Authentication with Passkeys, Secure Password Reset with Email Verification, and Encryption-At-Rest with Postgres or SQLite database.
author: VoidAuth
